subject: re:Introduce special discounts for all our customers
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
Think that the more you pay for your medications, the better they are? CanadianPharmacy proves that real quality doesn't have to cost too much. The most popular generic medications at prices lower than you can imagine are waiting for you at CanadianPharmacy the most reliable Canadian pharmacy on the Web.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Yours faithfully,Chester Ferris
